titleStmt.title: Ministers for tythes, being a manifest proof that these men are no ministers of the Gospel, who follow the magistrate for a worldly maintenance, and fee the lawyers to plead for tythes. By Willam [sic] Erbery.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for Giles Calvet [i.e. Calvert], at the signe of the Black spread-Eagle, at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Black spread-Eagle, at the West end of Pauls
